id, store_id AS storeId, anchored_store_id AS anchoredStoreId, store_name AS storeName, store_phone AS storePhone, store_logo AS storeLogo, order_source AS orderSource, order_no AS orderNo, trade_no AS tradeNo, type, status, beautician_reply_comment_status AS beauticianReplyCommentStatus, nums, amount_total AS amountTotal, freight, pay_type AS payType, need_pay AS needPay, amount_pay AS amountPay, point, pay_time AS payTime, return_status AS returnStatus, member_id AS memberId, member_phone AS memberPhone, member_real_name AS memberRealName, member_nick_name AS memberNickName, customer_name AS customerName, customer_phone AS customerPhone, customer_address AS customerAddress, customer_longitude AS customerLongitude, customer_latitude AS customerLatitude, card_id AS cardId, card_code AS cardCode, card_type_name AS cardTypeName, preferential_amount AS preferentialAmount, member_card_reduce AS memberCardReduce, one_card_discount AS oneCardDiscount, one_card_reduce AS oneCardReduce, coupon_id AS couponId, coupon_reduce AS couponReduce, amount_reduce AS amountReduce, appointment_time AS appointmentTime, address_id AS addressId, address, address_phone AS addressPhone, address_reveiver AS addressReveiver, address_regson AS addressRegson, server_start_time AS serverStartTime, server_end_time AS serverEndTime, add_time AS addTime, delivery_time AS deliveryTime, receive_time AS receiveTime, return_time AS returnTime, remark, is_enabled AS isEnabled, qr_code AS qrCode, verification_code AS verificationCode, actual_start_time AS actualStartTime, actual_end_time AS actualEndTime

mapper.update:
update order_base
store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
anchored_store_id = #{anchoredStoreId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
store_name = #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_phone = #{storePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_logo = #{storeLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_source = #{orderSource,jdbcType=TINYINT},
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trade_no = #{tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
beautician_reply_comment_status = #{beauticianReplyCommentStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
nums = #{nums,jdbcType=INTEGER},
amount_total = #{amountTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER},
freight = #{freight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
need_pay = #{needPay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
amount_pay = #{amountPay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
point = #{point,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
return_status = #{returnStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_phone = #{memberPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_real_name = #{memberRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_nick_name = #{memberNickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_phone = #{customerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_address = #{customerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_longitude = #{customerLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_latitude = #{customerLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
card_code = #{cardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_type_name = #{cardTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
preferential_amount = #{preferentialAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_card_reduce = #{memberCardReduce,jdbcType=INTEGER},
one_card_discount = #{oneCardDiscount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
one_card_reduce = #{oneCardReduce,jdbcType=INTEGER},
coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
coupon_reduce = #{couponReduce,jdbcType=INTEGER},
amount_reduce = #{amountReduce,jdbcType=INTEGER},
appointment_time = #{appointmentTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address_phone = #{addressPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address_reveiver = #{addressReveiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address_regson = #{addressRegson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
server_start_time = #{serverStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
server_end_time = #{serverEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delivery_time = #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
receive_time = #{receiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
return_time = #{returnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_enabled = #{isEnabled,jdbcType=BIT},
qr_code = #{qrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
verification_code = #{verificationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
actual_start_time = #{actualStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
actual_end_time = #{actualEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.store_id AS storeId, o.store_name AS storeName, o.store_phone as storePhone, o.order_source AS orderSource, o.order_no AS orderNo, o.trade_no AS tradeNo, o.type, o.status, o.amount_total AS amountTotal, o.pay_type AS payType, o.amount_pay AS amountPay, o.pay_time AS payTime, o.return_status AS returnStatus, o.member_id AS memberId, o.member_phone AS memberPhone, o.member_real_name AS memberRealName, o.member_card_reduce AS memberCardReduce, o.customer_name as customerName, o.customer_phone as customerPhone, o.customer_address as customerAddress, o.coupon_reduce AS couponReduce, o.amount_reduce AS amountReduce, o.address as memberAddress, o.address_phone AS addressPhone, o.address_reveiver AS addressReveiver, o.address_regson AS addressRegson, o.server_start_time AS serverStartTime, o.server_end_time AS serverEndTime, o.add_time AS addTime, o.receive_time AS receiveTime, o.return_time AS returnTime, o.remark, o.actual_start_time AS actualStartTime, o.actual_end_time AS actualEndTime, ob.beautician_id AS beauticianId, ob.img_url AS imgUrl, ob.beautician_name AS beauticianName, ob.mobile AS beauticianPhone, op.product_name AS productName, op.product_img AS productImg, op.product_price AS productPrice FROM order_base o INNER JOIN order_beautician ob ON o.id = ob.order_id INNER JOIN order_product op ON o.id = op.order_id WHERE o.id = #{orderId}
mapper.update: update order_base set status=4 WHERE status=3 and actual_end_time < now()
mapper.select:
select
from order_base where status=4 and is_enabled=1 and NOW() > DATE_ADD(add_time,INTERVAL 7 day)

SELECT o.id AS orderId, o.order_no AS orderNo, ob.store_seller_phone AS storeSellerPhone, ob.store_seller_member_id AS storeSellerMemberId, ob.beautician_id AS beauticianId, ob.beautician_member_id AS beauticianMemberId, ob.mobile AS beauticianPhone, o.server_start_time AS serverStartTime, o.member_id AS memberId, o.member_phone AS memberPhone, o.member_real_name AS memberName, o.customer_name AS customerName, o.customer_phone AS customerPhone, op.server_need_time AS serverNeedTime, op.product_name AS productName, op.product_img AS productImg, op.product_id AS productId, o.type AS productType FROM order_base o INNER JOIN order_beautician ob ON o.id = ob.order_id INNER JOIN order_product op ON o.id = op.order_id WHERE o.is_enabled = 1 AND o.`status` = 2 AND o.return_status = 0 AND server_start_time >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 MINUTE) and server_start_time <= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 31 MINUTE) GROUP BY o.id, o.order_no, ob.store_seller_phone, ob.store_seller_member_id, ob.beautician_id, ob.beautician_member_id, ob.mobile, o.server_start_time, o.member_id, o.member_phone, o.member_real_name, o.customer_name, o.customer_phone, op.server_need_time, op.product_name, op.product_img, op.product_id, o.type ORDER BY add_time ASC

SELECT o.id AS orderId, o.order_no AS orderNo, ob.store_seller_phone AS storeSellerPhone, ob.store_seller_member_id AS storeSellerMemberId, ob.beautician_id AS beauticianId, ob.beautician_member_id AS beauticianMemberId, ob.mobile AS beauticianPhone, o.server_start_time AS serverStartTime, o.member_id AS memberId, o.member_phone AS memberPhone, o.member_real_name AS memberName, o.customer_name AS customerName, o.customer_phone AS customerPhone, op.server_need_time AS serverNeedTime, op.product_name AS productName, op.product_img AS productImg, op.product_id AS productId, o.type AS productType FROM order_base o INNER JOIN order_beautician ob ON o.id = ob.order_id INNER JOIN order_product op ON o.id = op.order_id where o.`status`=3 and now() > o.actual_end_time

SELECT count(0)as num, SUM(amount_pay)as total FROM order_base
`status`=2 and return_status=0
and store_id=#{storeId}
and pay_time > #{chooseTime} and pay_time < now()

SELECT
FROM order_base WHERE `status`=3 and now() > actual_end_time

SELECT ob.id, ob.store_id AS storeId, ob.anchored_store_id AS anchoredStoreId, ob.store_name AS storeName, ob.store_phone AS storePhone, ob.store_logo AS storeLogo, ob.order_source AS orderSource, ob.order_no AS orderNo, ob.trade_no AS tradeNo, ob.type, ob.status, ob.nums, ob.amount_total AS amountTotal, ob.freight, ob.pay_type AS payType, ob.need_pay AS needPay, ob.amount_pay AS amountPay, ob.point, ob.pay_time AS payTime, ob.return_status AS returnStatus, ob.member_id AS memberId, ob.member_phone AS memberPhone, ob.member_real_name AS memberRealName, ob.member_nick_name AS memberNickName, ob.customer_name AS customerName, ob.customer_phone AS customerPhone, ob.customer_address AS customerAddress, ob.customer_longitude AS customerLongitude, ob.customer_latitude AS customerLatitude, ob.card_id AS cardId, ob.card_code AS cardCode, ob.card_type_name AS cardTypeName, ob.preferential_amount AS preferentialAmount, ob.member_card_reduce AS memberCardReduce, ob.coupon_reduce AS couponReduce, ob.amount_reduce AS amountReduce, ob.appointment_time AS appointmentTime, ob.address_id AS addressId, ob.address, ob.address_phone AS addressPhone, ob.address_reveiver AS addressReveiver, ob.address_regson AS addressRegson, ob.server_start_time AS serverStartTime, ob.server_end_time AS serverEndTime, ob.add_time AS addTime, ob.delivery_time AS deliveryTime, ob.receive_time AS receiveTime, ob.return_time AS returnTime, ob.remark, ob.is_enabled AS isEnabled, ob.qr_code AS qrCode, ob.verification_code AS verificationCode, ob.actual_start_time AS actualStartTime, ob.actual_end_time AS actualEndTime FROM `order_base` ob INNER JOIN order_return orn ON ob.id = orn.order_id WHERE ob.`status` = 2 AND ob.return_status = 1 AND NOW() > DATE_ADD( orn.apply_time, INTERVAL 2 DAY )

SELECT count(0) AS count FROM order_base
status>1
store_id=#{storeId} and status>1
and TO_DAYS(NOW())=TO_DAYS(add_time)
and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= date(add_time)
and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= date(add_time)

SELECT o.id AS orderId, o.order_no as orderNo, ob.store_seller_phone as storeSellerPhone, ob.store_seller_member_id as storeSellerMemberId, ob.beautician_id AS beauticianId, ob.beautician_member_id as beauticianMemberId, ob.mobile as beauticianPhone, o.server_start_time AS serverStartTime, o.member_id AS memberId, o.member_phone AS memberPhone, o.member_real_name AS memberName, o.customer_name AS customerName, o.customer_phone AS customerPhone, op.server_need_time AS serverNeedTime, op.product_name AS productName, op.product_img AS productImg, op.product_id AS productId, o.type AS productType FROM order_base o INNER JOIN order_beautician ob ON o.id = ob.order_id INNER JOIN order_product op ON o.id = op.order_id where o.id=#{orderId}
